description:
You know times are changing – and narratives shifting – when the BBC runs a report on a man "left to rot" after his Pfizer Covid booster "destroyed his life" and left him in permanent pain.

The post Man Says He Has Been “Left to Rot” After Covid Vaccine – BBC Report appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Man Says He Has Been “Left to Rot” After Covid Vaccine – BBC Report

description:
Even Sally Rooney's usual army of fans are tiring of her hyper-right-on schtick, if the review of her latest novel in the Times is anything to go by, says Steven Tucker. Time to rediscover Ireland's real literature.

The post Why I’ve Never Read a Sally Rooney Novel and I’m Not Going to Start Now appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why I’ve Never Read a Sally Rooney Novel and I’m Not Going to Start Now

description:
Kamala Harris has pledged to legalise recreational marijuana and create "forgivable" loans in a bid to win black men's votes after Barack Obama said some "aren't feeling the idea of having a woman as President".

The post Harris Pledges to Legalise Recreational Marijuana and Create “Forgivable” Loans in Bid to Win Black Men’s Votes appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Harris Pledges to Legalise Recreational Marijuana and Create “Forgivable” Loans in Bid to Win Black Men’s Votes

description:
A Hezbollah tunnel has been found 100 metres from a UN peacekeeper base in Lebanon, raising questions about how the UN could be unaware of it and why UN troops are refusing to evacuate.

The post The Hezbollah Tunnel 100 Metres From a UN Base appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Hezbollah Tunnel 100 Metres From a UN Base

description:
Baroness Royall, one of the frontrunners in the Oxford Chancellorship race, has run into a free speech row after Alumni for Free Speech wrote to all the candidates asking them to set out their position on the issue.

The post Baroness Royall, Leading Candidate in Oxford Chancellorship Race, Runs Into Free Speech Row appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Baroness Royall, Leading Candidate in Oxford Chancellorship Race, Runs Into Free Speech Row

description:
The Big Tech companies are setting up AI data centres that will consume vast amounts of electricity – OpenAI alone wants to create seven that will consume more electricity per year than the UK. So much for Net Zero.

The post Open AI Wants to Build Data Centres That Would Consume More Electricity Per Year Than the Whole of the U.K. appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Open AI Wants to Build Data Centres That Would Consume More Electricity Per Year Than the Whole of the U.K.

description:
Not happy with ruining the mental health of teenagers, climate campaigners are now hoping to do the same to the elderly by targeting their allotments. You couldn't make it up, says the Daily Sceptic's Chris Morrison.

The post Greens Declare War on Growing Greens appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Greens Declare War on Growing Greens
